S

setAllText(char[]) - Method in class gui.BoardCanvas
Displays the string s on the board.
spin(int) - Method in class hw2.Wheel
Adds the given number of degrees to the wheel's position.
spinWheel(int) - Method in class hw2.Game
Spins the wheel and updates the game state accordingly.

Puts a task on the Swing event queue to instantiate all the components.

Start a new round of the game using the given GameText.
subtractFromRoundBalance(int) - Method in class hw2.Player
